page.title: 08Codsall Police Station
page.content: The Station possesses a finger print machine but no intoximeter. There are no cells, the nearest ones being at Wombourne where the nearest Magistrate's Court is also located. Stray animals are received and there is a kennel. The animals are held for up to 24 hours before being taken away. The nearest Police Dog Handlers are at the main base in Stafford. The Codsall Police Officers involve themselves in the community in ways apart from their normal role. At the moment there is a S.P.A.C.E. (Staffordshire Police Activity and Community Enterprise) scheme in operation which provides sport and leisure activities for local children during the school holidays. WPC. Turner confessed to a liking for Police stories on TV !
